title: That’s fair
author: VD
content_html:
The good news: Joe Carter of the Evangelical Outpost considers VP to be one of the top 100 Christian blogs.

The bad news: That would be #97… and Joe doesn’t know how to spell it.

Actually, the lowly rating is somewhat of a relief, because as I’ve tried to make clear to everyone, no one should ever makes the mistake of judging the verity or falsity of Christianity on the basis of my example. I’m a Christian, I’m just not a very good one. That’s not modesty – you know I don’t do modesty – it’s just the facts.

There are those who walk the Way in giant strides. Then there are the rest of us, who merely hope that we can manage two steps forward for every one step back. Either way, it’s worth remembering that we have a guide who never hurries.
